fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Once each day you may specify a non-Town role and learn 1. if the role was assigned to at least one player at the start of the game and 2. if at least one currently living player has that role (but you don't learn which exact players).

- Each night you may visit one player. If they are attacked, you learn what role attacked them (but not who that role belongs to).
